'''Dr. Simcox''' is one of the doctors who treated [[Heather Parker]] after her meth exploded.

==History==
When the meth Heather was cooking exploded, she and Betsey were taken to the ER, where Dr. Simcox treated them.

==Career==
He is a doctor at [[St. Ambrose Hospital]]. Given that he works in the ER, he's likely critical care or a trauma surgeon.
